excerpt: "Spiritual focus increases openness to AI's guidance in decision-making. High AI presence in work reduces reliance on spiritual beliefs. Perception of AI as a tool or replacement influences spiritual connection. Constant AI interaction challenges our understanding of human uniqueness."
